beer.beer_description: A bright, hop-forward IPA loaded with lime, citrus, and tropical fruit. Smooth bitterness, clean finish. Does whatever a Dip Hop does! Bright, clean and hoppy with aromas of lime, citrus, melon, tropical and stone fruit on the palette.
